So she was thinking it over for a week, and final decide that she was going to find Danny to help her become an animal and loose her ghost form. When she found Danny she explained what she wanted to do and to her surprise he agreed. Danny wished for Desiree to become any animal she was thinking of.

155311.content:
After having captured Desiree in the Fenton Thermos again, Danny sighed, tired.

"Ugh... when is she going to learn?" He said as he subconsciously rubbed the Thermos. Suddenly, something odd happened; the Thermos's blue glow turned green and green smoke came out of the top. "What the--"

As the smoke condensed, out popped the figure of Desiree, a smile on her face. As Danny got ready to attack, Desiree spoke out, saying, "Mmm... Thank you, Master, for freeing me,"

"Wha--Master? What do you mean?"

"You have succeeded in capturing me, and by rubbing the object you hold, it has become my new holding area and you my new master."

"Wait... like an actual genie?"

"Precisely!"

"How many wishes do I get?"

"As many as you want, Master! There's no limit."

Amazed, Danny racked his brain about what he could do. And then, with his teenage hormones kicking into high gear, he responded, "Desiree, I wish your hourglass figure was even bigger!"

"Your wish is my command, Master!" Desiree responded as her hands glowed. All at once, her chest and hips began to balloon out, becoming much bigger in the process. "Ohh..." Desiree said she began to rub both of her new assets. "What a kind Master I have, enhancing my beauty as his first wish..." Danny, meanwhile, tried not to drool at his genie's new look.

Turning to Danny, she smirked and replied, "Now then, Master, what else can your humble genie slave do next?"

Thinking for a second, Danny wished...
155311.title: New Master, New Form

1553111.content:
Danny looks at Desiree up and down one more, and thinks he can do better. He can make her as sexy as he wants! And he has a few plans.

"I wish that you had human legs and stood at a height of 6 foot 7!"

Desiree smirks at his wish. "I see you like big girls, master. Your wish is my comand!" And so, her ghostly tail be comes a pair of long, slender, green, human like legs. She floats down and lands on the ground and feels an enerft build up inside her.

Slowly, the genie begins to grow upwards more and more, much to her own pleasure, as well as Danny's. She watched as the boy become shorter and shorter, untill she reaches her max height. She smiles down at Danny.

"My my, you looks so tiny master, but i suppose thats how you like it?" Danny could only nod in response. "Any more wishes master?" She asked him.

Danny thought for a moment and noted how her boobs were just above his head. 'Hmm. Maybe i could make those a bit bigger!'

"I wish your boobs were three times their current size!" He proclaimed. She smiles and grants him his wish, and they both watched as her bust expand like balloons. The genie moaned in pleasure as her boobs got bigger and bigger.

Eventualy they stopped, and she could no longer see the ghost boy infront of her. She giggled and bent down, placing her masive boobs against his head. "What els would you like master?"

1553212.content:
"At long last..." Desiree said as she looked over the denizens of the world, hidden from them at the time but not for long. "With my new power, I can wreak vengeance upon this world and claim it for myself! It will be so delicious..." Suddenly, she stopped, the strange feeling she had intensifying. "What? What's going on?"

Suddenly, her body began to grow, becoming bigger and bigger. "Huh, what is this?!" She became more and more bloated, becoming more and more spherical as the minutes passed on. "What is going on here?! Oh-- Oh no!" Desiree suddenly realized the truth. "All that power I have... I got too much at once! It's becoming too much for my body... If I don't keep it down, I'll explode!"

Using her powers, Desiree tried to keep her rising powers at bay, hoping that she could stop her newfound might from destroying her.

After what seemed like an eternity...
1553212.title: With Great Power...

info.brief_description: Desiree the wishing ghost from Danny Phantom suffers whatever crazy changes.
info.description:
Desiree The wishing ghost is my only favorite ghost character from Danny Phantom and this interactive story, Desiree suffers crazy or dirty changes. There are a few things and rules that you need to know before you place chapters.

1. Proper Grammar and good spelling.
2. No short chapters
3. No blood or gore
4. Fetish stuff is allowed in this story
5. Desiree the wishing ghost is the main character Not the other ghost except if Desiree and Danny or any other ghost character combine
6. These five things are the rules of this story.
7. No rule breaking
8. Have Fun!
